channel.title: CVE Feed for Hancom -- HCell
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hancom -- HCell

item.title: CVE-2023-40250|2024-08-02T18:24:55.953Z -- hancom -- hcell
item.description: Buffer Copy without Checking Size of Input ('Classic Buffer Overflow') vulnerability in Hancom HCell on Windows allows Overflow Buffers.This issue affects HCell: 12.0.0.893.
